history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER Fifth and Highland
TTS Okay, leaving from highland avenue at fifth avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER the day
TTS Okay, going to the dog stop - strip district, pittsburgh. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER tomorrow
TTS Okay, travelling at 01:08 pm.
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 15 minutes..
Head southwest on Fifth avenue toward Woodland Rd..
Turn right onto Devonshire St..
Turn left onto Centre avenue..
Turn right onto Enfield St..
Turn left onto Baum Blvd/Baum Blvd Bridge. Continue to follow Baum Blvd..
Baum Blvd turns right and becomes north Craig St..
Continue onto Bigelow Blvd..
Turn right onto Finland St..
Turn left onto Melwood avenue..
Turn right onto Herron avenue..
Turn left onto Liberty avenue..
Turn right onto 27th St..
Turn left onto Smallman St. Destination will be on the left..
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
